std.experimental.color

This package contains implementations of various common color types. Types are supplied for various color spaces, along with color space conversion functionality.

Authors:
Manu Evans

License:


Source:


enum auto isColor(T);
Detect whether 
T
is a color type compatible with std.experimental.color.

Examples:
import std.experimental.color.rgb;
import std.experimental.color.hsx;
import std.experimental.color.xyz;

static assert(isColor!RGB8 == true);
static assert(isColor!(XYZ!float) == true);
static assert(isColor!(HSL!float) == true);
static assert(isColor!float == false);


enum auto isColorComponentType(T);
Detect whether 
T
is a valid color component type.

enum auto isColorScalarType(T);
Detect whether 
T
can represent a color component.

alias RGB8 = std.experimental.color.rgb.RGB!("rgb", ubyte, false, cast(RGBColorSpace)0).RGB;
24 bit RGB color type with 8 bits per channel.

alias RGBX8 = std.experimental.color.rgb.RGB!("rgbx", ubyte, false, cast(RGBColorSpace)0).RGB;
32 bit RGB color type with 8 bits per channel.

alias RGBA8 = std.experimental.color.rgb.RGB!("rgba", ubyte, false, cast(RGBColorSpace)0).RGB;
32 bit RGB + alpha color type with 8 bits per channel.

alias RGBf32 = std.experimental.color.rgb.RGB!("rgb", float, false, cast(RGBColorSpace)0).RGB;
Floating point RGB color type.

alias RGBAf32 = std.experimental.color.rgb.RGB!("rgba", float, false, cast(RGBColorSpace)0).RGB;
Floating point RGB + alpha color type.

alias BGR8 = std.experimental.color.rgb.RGB!("bgr", ubyte, false, cast(RGBColorSpace)0).RGB;
24 bit BGR color type with 8 bits per channel.

alias BGRX8 = std.experimental.color.rgb.RGB!("bgrx", ubyte, false, cast(RGBColorSpace)0).RGB;
32 bit BGR color type with 8 bits per channel.

alias BGRA8 = std.experimental.color.rgb.RGB!("bgra", ubyte, false, cast(RGBColorSpace)0).RGB;
32 bit BGR + alpha color type with 8 bits per channel.

alias L8 = std.experimental.color.rgb.RGB!("l", ubyte, false, cast(RGBColorSpace)0).RGB;
8 bit luminance-only color type.

alias A8 = std.experimental.color.rgb.RGB!("a", ubyte, false, cast(RGBColorSpace)0).RGB;
8 bit alpha-only color type.

alias LA8 = std.experimental.color.rgb.RGB!("la", ubyte, false, cast(RGBColorSpace)0).RGB;
16 bit luminance + alpha color type with 8 bits per channel.

alias UV8 = std.experimental.color.rgb.RGB!("rg", byte, false, cast(RGBColorSpace)0).RGB;
16 bit signed UV color type with 8 bits per channel.

alias UVW8 = std.experimental.color.rgb.RGB!("rgb", byte, false, cast(RGBColorSpace)0).RGB;
24 bit signed UVW color type with 8 bits per channel.

alias UVf32 = std.experimental.color.rgb.RGB!("rg", float, false, cast(RGBColorSpace)0).RGB;
Floating point UV color type.

alias UVWf32 = std.experimental.color.rgb.RGB!("rgb", float, false, cast(RGBColorSpace)0).RGB;
Floating point UVW color type.

enum Colors: RGB!("rgb", ubyte, false, cast(RGBColorSpace)0);
Set of colors defined by X11, adopted by the W3C, SVG, and other popular libraries.

pure nothrow @nogc @safe To convertColor(To, From)(From color);
Convert between color types.

Examples:
assert(convertColor!(RGBA8)(convertColor!(XYZ!float)(RGBA8(0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF))) == RGBA8(0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF, 0));


pure @safe Color colorFromString(Color = RGB8)(const(char)[] str);
Create a color from a string. May be a hex color in the standard forms: (#/$/0x)rgb/argb/rrggbb/aarrggbb May also be the name of any color from the 
Colors
enum.

Examples:
// common hex formats supported:

// 3 digits
static assert(colorFromString("F80") == RGB8(0xFF, 0x88, 0x00));
static assert(colorFromString("#F80") == RGB8(0xFF, 0x88, 0x00));
static assert(colorFromString("$F80") == RGB8(0xFF, 0x88, 0x00));
static assert(colorFromString("0xF80") == RGB8(0xFF, 0x88, 0x00));

// 6 digits
static assert(colorFromString("FF8000") == RGB8(0xFF, 0x80, 0x00));
static assert(colorFromString("#FF8000") == RGB8(0xFF, 0x80, 0x00));
static assert(colorFromString("$FF8000") == RGB8(0xFF, 0x80, 0x00));
static assert(colorFromString("0xFF8000") == RGB8(0xFF, 0x80, 0x00));

// 4/8 digita (/w alpha)
static assert(colorFromString!RGBA8("#8C41") == RGBA8(0xCC, 0x44, 0x11, 0x88));
static assert(colorFromString!RGBA8("#80CC4401") == RGBA8(0xCC, 0x44, 0x01, 0x80));

// named colors (case-insensitive)
static assert(colorFromString("red") == RGB8(0xFF, 0x0, 0x0));
static assert(colorFromString("WHITE") == RGB8(0xFF, 0xFF, 0xFF));
static assert(colorFromString("LightGoldenrodYellow") == RGB8(250,250,210));
